compatibility.notes: The ESA-PL-weak-copyleft-2.4 license allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the licensed code must remain under the same license, it can be combined with proprietary code under certain conditions.

key_requirements: Provide a copy of the license with any distribution.
Retain copyright notices in all copies.
Disclose source code for modified versions.
State changes made to the original software.
license.name: ESA-PL-weak-copyleft-2.4
obligations: Source code must be made available when distributing modified versions.
License must be included with any distribution of the software.
Copyright notice must be retained in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Any modifications must be stated clearly in the documentation.
